answers.q: ferrous lactate vs ferric orthophosphate, which is better
answers.a: For iron fortification, ferrous lactate is generally more bioavailable and more soluble than ferric orthophosphate, but it can have more sensory impact. Ferric orthophosphate is less reactive with fewer taste/color changes, though it provides lower iron absorption.

answers.q: how many waters in ferrous lactate hydrate
answers.a: Ferrous lactate is commonly supplied as the dihydrate, Fe(C3H5O3)2·2H2O. Other hydrates may occur depending on preparation and storage, but the dihydrate is typical in food use.

answers.q: how to add a bootable ssd in a levono e585
answers.a: This is about a Lenovo E585 device, not the food additive E585 (ferrous lactate); please refer to Lenovo’s service manual for SSD installation and boot configuration.

answers.q: how to change apn settings on huawei e585
answers.a: This pertains to a Huawei E585 hotspot, not the food additive E585; consult the device’s user guide or your mobile carrier for APN setup steps.

answers.q: how to change e585 hard drive
answers.a: This appears to be about a device model (e.g., Lenovo E585), not the food additive E585; follow the manufacturer’s service manual for hard drive replacement.
